name: PolyDeadz
description:
The PolyDeadz Project is a light-hearted and fun third person shooter that sets up to four players in an exhilarating fight for survival against endless waves of the undead. Players will level up classes and unlock better skills and weapons to survive the infected horde. 

As one of my first projects, this was meant to be a challenging task and force me to learn as much as I can. From artificial intelligence and sever replication to design documentation, this project has helped to teach me many new skills and I'm excited to take those skills even further in my next projects.
